name: Myth- A People Online Trivia | Mythology Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was the first man to appear in the Golden Age, and was the teacher and counselor to Athena and Zeus?
Who was the son of Eris, and personified sorrow?
Who was the daughter of Eris, and the personification of dispute?
Who was the personification of manslaughter?
Who was the progenitor of the Pleiades and the Hesperides?
Who was the triadic-member of the Fates, who cut the life-line of a person?
Who was the son of Aristaeus and Autonoe that was torn apart by his hounds?
Who was the Greek god of war?
What was the collective name for the companions of Jason during the search for the Golden Fleece?
Who was the only person left behind by Odysseus, while escaping from Polyphemus, the blinded cyclops?
